original_text: He presented himself alive to them after his suffering by many proofs, appearing to them during forty days and speaking about the kingdom of God.
korean_text: 그가 고난 받으신 후에 또한 그들에게 확실한 많은 증거로 친히 살아 계심을 나타내사 사십 일 동안 그들에게 보이시며 하나님 나라의 일을 말씀하시니라

sentences.original_text: He presented himself alive to them after his suffering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 고난 후에 살아 계신 자신을 그들에게 나타내셨습니다

sentences.original_text: appearing to them during forty days
and speaking about the kingdom of God
